channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - October 22, 2021
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-october-22-2021) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week's post includes a ton of videos from last weekend's GCOG, plus the usual Gauntlet Calendar videos, and features sessions of these great games:
* _Against the Vampire Conspiracy_ * _Ares Ascendant_ * _Bite Marks_ * _Blazing Hymn_ * _Carolina Death Crawl_ * _Eotenweard_ * _Escape From Dino Island_ * _eXorcists_ * _Hearts of Wulin_ * _Hit the Nazi - Retrieve the Ark_ * _In Extremis_ * _Ironsworn_ * _Lasers & Feelings_ * _Lord Why Have You Forsaken Me_ * _Palanquin_ * _Red Markets_ * _Stars in the Dark_ * _Swords of the Serpentine_ * _Tales from the Low Cantrefs_ * _The Between_ * _Thirsty Sword Lesbians_ * _Trophy Dark_ * _Visigoths vs Mall Goths_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar](https://gauntletcalendar.com/events) to play!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - October 22, 2021
item.dc:creator: @flatvurm
item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

Greetings, all! This week’s Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week’s post includes a ton of videos from last weekend’s GCOG, plus the usual Gauntlet Calendar videos, and features sessions of these great games:

Thanks go out to all this week’s facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the Gauntlet Calendar category on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the Gauntlet Calendar to play!
